TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AbstractPreferences extends Java.Util.Prefs.Preferences

Docs.summary: This class provides a skeletal implementation of the Preferences class, greatly easing the task of implementing it.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Java.Util.Prefs.AbstractPreferences parent, string name) cil managed

Docs.param: the parent of this preference node, or null if this is the root.
the name of this preference node, relative to its parent, or "" if this is the root.
Docs.summary: Creates a preference node with the specified parent and the specified name relative to its parent.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the name contains a slash character or is empty if parent is not null.
